Tucson now sees the shuttle ahead and tries desperately to keep his altitud=
e stable.  He extends his wings to their fullest to catch a strong pocket o=
f wind beneath them.  It seems to work nicely as he makes a last minute eff=
ort to glide quickly toward the shuttle.  

" I - am coming - in - now. " 
=

With extremely low energy supplies Tucson's transformation program forces =
him back into beast mode to preserve what is left of his fuel.   He manages=
 to hold onto Silverbolt during the conversion, with his front claws.  He b=
arely makes it into the shuttle, as he folds in his wings in a clumsy manne=
r, dragging his underbelly on the floor of the shuttle.  

He sets his frie=
nd down gently onto a platform and then collapses himself.  His breath is l=
abored yet he is still able to keep himself online.  And even in his compro=
mised state, he still carries an air of his famous temperament, as he narro=
ws his eyes with a low growl in his voice.

" About Rodimus...  If he chose=
 to turn on our faction, then so be it.  Instead of taking the initiative t=
o fend off the temptation, he has opted for an easy way out instead.  I did=
 what I could to save him!  I can not do any more than that! "

He snaps hi=
s tail in annoyance.  

" He has no sense of responsibility, self confidenc=
e, or the ineptitude to overcome a major adversity!  Of course he is vulner=
able to possession!  HE WANTS IT THAT WAY, IT'S THE EASIEST WAY AROUND A DI=
FFICULT SITUATION!"

He slaps a heavy front paw down on the shuttle floor. =
 Now exhausted, he tries to catch his breath. Yet he looks to Leo Prime as =
he fights to keep his head and long neck up off the shuttle floor.

" Leo P=
rime, the best thing to do is to relinquish his Prime status and revert him=
 back to Hot Rod, where he can do no harm.  From now on, until I am restore=
d, I ask that you assume all leadership duties while I recover.  Promise me=
 you will - do as I request?"

He can no longer hold up his head and lays i=
t back on the floor.  Yet he looks to Stanton while conversing with Leo Pri=
me.  It was clear to him that Rodimus was quite comfortable where he was an=
d that now it was time to do something about him.  The silver dragon harden=
s to the idea of having to fight against a friend who now proves to be his =
greatest foe.  A look of sheer determination covers his face as he remains =
grounded for the time being. 

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.=
 

On Aug 17, 2011, at 12:30 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> w=
rote:

but he could not help

k.

> >
> > At first he does=
n't answer Leo Prime. Silverbolt was his priority now. He
> > quickly place=
s a hand on Silverbolts chest and performs an energy
> > transfusion from h=
is body to Silverbolt. Yet his own reserves were not at a
> > hundred perce=
nt either. He didn't care, all he cared about was getting his
> > friend ba=
ck to the shuttle with what life he could give him.
> >
> > As energy flows=
 from his body into Silverbolts Tucson begins to falter a bit
> > in mid ai=
r. Yet as swift as he was in flight, he could see the shuttle
> > ahead. Bu=
t would he make it in time before his own system shut down?
> >
> > " Just =
a little more. Almost there. Leo Rodimus is not respondent at
> > this time=
. I - have not received word as - of yet."
> >
> > He struggles to fight of=
f the urge to make an emergency landing. Instead he
> > uses the last of hi=
s reserves to speed up his flight pace and is now just a
> > few feet from =
the shuttle, but losing altitude while doing so.
> >
> > " Can't keep the a=
ltitude much longer. I'm coming in. Have the - shuttle
> > ready for boardi=
ng..."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> The energy infusion from TUSCON into SILVERBOLT, whi=
le leaving TUSCON
> extremely tired seems to have a beneficial affect. His =
optics light
> very dimly. He is no where near conscious, but his spark ene=
rgy
> continues to stay lit at a very low level.
> 
> "I read you." LEO PRI=
ME says over the comlink. "The shuttle should be
> reaching you momentairll=
y. Once you recharge we will need someone to
> make absolutely sure that Ro=
dimus is a Predacon now." There a short
> pause as LEO's voice drops slight=
ly. "He deserves that, and I believe
> he deserves our most earnest effort.=
"
> 
> Even as LEO stopped talking the shuttle can be seen on the horizon,
=
> its boxy shape was dark in the skies of early morning. The sun had not
> =
yet risen in the skies of ancient Earth but the light of it was making
> it=
self seen at last. A new day was about to be born, and hopefully new
> hope=
 as well.
> 
> "We see you." SANTON said over a short range to TUSCON, "The=
 doors
> will be open and ready for you when you arrive. We have the suppli=
es
> you need."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston

o Prime.  Silverbolt was his priority now.  He<br>

nd on Silverbolts chest and performs an energy<br>

s body to Silverbolt.  Yet his own reserves were not at a<br>

percent either.  He didn't care, all he cared about was getting his<br>
&gt=

r a bit<br>

The energy infusion fr=
om TUSCON into SILVERBOLT, while leaving TUSCON<br>
extremely tired seems t=
o have a beneficial affect. His optics light<br>
very dimly. He is no where=
 near conscious, but his spark energy<br>
continues to stay lit at a very l=
ow level.<br>
<br>
"I read you." LEO PRIME says over the comlink. "The shut=
tle should be<br>
reaching you momentairlly. Once you recharge we will need=
 someone to<br>
make absolutely sure that Rodimus is a Predacon now." There=
 a short<br>
pause as LEO's voice drops slightly. "He deserves that, and I =
believe<br>
he deserves our most earnest effort."<br>
<br>
Even as LEO stop=
ped talking the shuttle can be seen on the horizon,<br>
its boxy shape was =
dark in the skies of early morning. The sun had not<br>
yet risen in the sk=
ies of ancient Earth but the light of it was making<br>
itself seen at last=
. A new day was about to be born, and hopefully new<br>
hope as well.<br>
<=
br>
"We see you." SANTON said over a short range to TUSCON, "The doors<br>
=
will be open and ready for you when you arrive. We have the supplies<br>
yo=
u need."<br>
